flood: Avoid walking or driving through floodwater.
Turn off utilities if instructed by authorities.
Follow evacuation orders from local officials.
earthquake: Drop, Cover, and Hold On until shaking stops.
Stay away from glass and heavy furniture.
If outdoors, move to an open area away from buildings.
Check for injuries and damage after shaking.
cyclone: Stay indoors and away from windows.
Follow official evacuation notices if given.
Stock emergency supplies: water, food, torch.
fire: Evacuate immediately if you are in danger.
Cover your nose and mouth with cloth if smoke is present.
Call emergency services when you are safe.
default: Follow official guidance from local authorities.
